ExternalDatabaseInfo.SourceConnectString: Data Source=NTVMDTEST-006\SQLEXPRESS;Initial Catalog=ManagementEvaluationDB;Persist Security Info=True;User ID=kodaira;Password=kodaira
ExternalDatabaseInfo.CreateViewSql:
SELECT 
    employee.employee_z_code,
    employee.employee_name,
    employee.department_code_lvl00,
    employee.department_name_lvl00,
    employee.count_belonging_department,
    CASE 
        WHEN evaluation_commitee_lvl01.employee_z_code_consenter IS NOT NULL THEN evaluation_commitee_lvl01.employee_z_code_consenter
        WHEN evaluation_commitee_lvl02.employee_z_code_consenter IS NOT NULL THEN evaluation_commitee_lvl02.employee_z_code_consenter
        WHEN evaluation_commitee_lvl03.employee_z_code_consenter IS NOT NULL THEN evaluation_commitee_lvl03.employee_z_code_consenter
        WHEN evaluation_commitee_lvl04.employee_z_code_consenter IS NOT NULL THEN evaluation_commitee_lvl04.employee_z_code_consenter
        WHEN evaluation_commitee_lvl05.employee_z_code_consenter IS NOT NULL THEN evaluation_commitee_lvl05.employee_z_code_consenter
        WHEN evaluation_commitee_lvl06.employee_z_code_consenter IS NOT NULL THEN evaluation_commitee_lvl06.employee_z_code_consenter
        ELSE NULL
    END AS employee_z_code_consenter,
    CASE 
        WHEN evaluation_commitee_lvl01.employee_z_code_consenter IS NOT NULL THEN evaluation_commitee_lvl01.employee_name_consenter
        WHEN evaluation_commitee_lvl02.employee_z_code_consenter IS NOT NULL THEN evaluation_commitee_lvl02.employee_name_consenter
        WHEN evaluation_commitee_lvl03.employee_z_code_consenter IS NOT NULL THEN evaluation_commitee_lvl03.employee_name_consenter
        WHEN evaluation_commitee_lvl04.employee_z_code_consenter IS NOT NULL THEN evaluation_commitee_lvl04.employee_name_consenter
        WHEN evaluation_commitee_lvl05.employee_z_code_consenter IS NOT NULL THEN evaluation_commitee_lvl05.employee_name_consenter
        WHEN evaluation_commitee_lvl06.employee_z_code_consenter IS NOT NULL THEN evaluation_commitee_lvl06.employee_name_consenter
        ELSE NULL
    END AS employee_name_consenter,
    CASE 
        WHEN evaluation_commitee_lvl01.employee_z_code_consenter IS NOT NULL THEN evaluation_commitee_lvl01.POST_NAME
        WHEN evaluation_commitee_lvl02.employee_z_code_consenter IS NOT NULL THEN evaluation_commitee_lvl02.POST_NAME
        WHEN evaluation_commitee_lvl03.employee_z_code_consenter IS NOT NULL THEN evaluation_commitee_lvl03.POST_NAME
        WHEN evaluation_commitee_lvl04.employee_z_code_consenter IS NOT NULL THEN evaluation_commitee_lvl04.POST_NAME
        WHEN evaluation_commitee_lvl05.employee_z_code_consenter IS NOT NULL THEN evaluation_commitee_lvl05.POST_NAME
        WHEN evaluation_commitee_lvl06.employee_z_code_consenter IS NOT NULL THEN evaluation_commitee_lvl06.POST_NAME
        ELSE NULL
    END AS consenter_post_name

FROM [rds-commondb-poc-zeon-db-001.cjzyjlprofpu.ap-northeast-1.rds.amazonaws.com].[Dev_L_USER_MST].[dbo].[lum_view_employee_department_relations_duplicated] AS employee

LEFT JOIN V_ManagementEvaluationCommitteeRelations AS evaluation_commitee_lvl01 
    ON employee.department_code_lvl01 = evaluation_commitee_lvl01.department_code_lvl04
    AND  evaluation_commitee_lvl01.level_no_lvl00 = 1

LEFT JOIN V_ManagementEvaluationCommitteeRelations AS evaluation_commitee_lvl02 
    ON employee.department_code_lvl02 = evaluation_commitee_lvl02.department_code_lvl04
    AND  evaluation_commitee_lvl02.level_no_lvl00 = 2

LEFT JOIN V_ManagementEvaluationCommitteeRelations AS evaluation_commitee_lvl03 
    ON employee.department_code_lvl03 = evaluation_commitee_lvl03.department_code_lvl04
    AND evaluation_commitee_lvl03.level_no_lvl00 = 3

LEFT JOIN V_ManagementEvaluationCommitteeRelations AS evaluation_commitee_lvl04 
    ON employee.department_code_lvl04 = evaluation_commitee_lvl04.department_code_lvl04
    AND  evaluation_commitee_lvl04.level_no_lvl00 = 4

LEFT JOIN V_ManagementEvaluationCommitteeRelations AS evaluation_commitee_lvl05 
    ON employee.department_code_lvl05 = evaluation_commitee_lvl05.department_code_lvl04
    AND  evaluation_commitee_lvl05.level_no_lvl00 = 5

LEFT JOIN V_ManagementEvaluationCommitteeRelations AS evaluation_commitee_lvl06 
    ON employee.department_code_lvl06 = evaluation_commitee_lvl06.department_code_lvl04
    AND  evaluation_commitee_lvl06.level_no_lvl00 = 6
